name: aortic dissection
description: Aortic dissection is a critical condition characterized by the separation of the aortic wall layers due to an intimal tear, resulting in an intramural hematoma and potential rupture; it often presents with severe, acute chest or back pain and may lead to life-threatening complications.

attributes.name: presence
attributes.description: Presence or absence of aortic dissection

values.name: indeterminate
values.description: Presence of aortic dissection cannot be determined

values.name: unknown
values.description: Presence of aortic dissection is unknown

attributes.name: change from prior
attributes.description: Whether and how a aortic dissection has changed over time
